Summary: We stayed for 3 nights the end of October 2011. The hotel staff member was pleasant. The room was clean but the bed linens were filthy. I asked for new bedding and the gentleman did help but they did not have one clean blanket or comforter, only sheets.(???)  I was offered to switch to another room which upon inspecting the bedding was dirty as well. I decline that one, (we had quite a bit of luggage) got new sheets and toughed it out. To sum it up, Staff was pleasant, Room was clean, Bed was comfortable, Area was safe, Breakfast was decent, Price of room was so-so, Linens were fithy.

Based on its proximity, it seems like a logical place for families going to Disneyland to stay but either there was no one there when I was there or they were amazingly quiet.  The parking lot was half full each morning so there were definitely other guests in the hotel.  The staff was extremely friendly.  My only complaint was what I'd call a "poor" breakfast.
